[set_font 0]FONT 0 with ESC M 0
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[set_font 1]FONT 1 with ESC M 1
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[set_font a]FONT A with ESC ! 0
[set_font b]FONT B with ESC ! 1
[set_font emph]emphasized
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[set_font tall]tall
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[set_font wide]wide
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[set_font quad]quadruple
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[set_font ul]underlined
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[set_font b e q u]mixed
123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+123456789+
[foreachline n {0x1 0x2 0x4 0x8 0x10 0x20 0x40 0x80} {[set_font $n][set n]}]
[set_font]end.
